title: Kujibiki Tokushou: Musou Harem-ken (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Charismatic Protagonist   Cheats   Confident Protagonist   Different Social Status   First-time Interc**rse   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Lottery   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Maids   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty   Sentient Objects   S*ave Harem   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Unique Weapon User   Unique Weapons
author: Miki Nazuna   三木なずな
description:
“I’ll seize everything I want! And then, I’ll satisfy all my desires!”

Being transported to a different world after winning a prize from a lottery, every single one of Kakeru’s abilities was 777-fold strong, making him a cheat-like existence.

His power making him the strongest, 777-fold.

HIs magic power, 777-fold as well.

With all his abilities 777 times stronger, Kakeru decides to go on the harem route! And, whilst being able to use the lottery even in the other world, Kakeru’s cheat-like abilities only grow even further—nobody can stop the unparalleled harem anymore?!>
